page.title: 05HOBBIES, SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: Fishing in the River Avon is another popular sport in this area. You can catch carp, trout, greyling, pike, perch, barbel, salmon and many other fish. The trout season starts on April 1st and finishes on October 15th.The coarse fishing starts on June 16th and finishes on March 26th. Sir Hugh Brassey,a local Landowner, allows people to use his swimming pool and tennis courts by special permission,and every year hosts the Little Somerford fete.Little Somerford also has a play park,with swings, slides,a climbing frame and a grass area for ball games. Within our area skittles is the only team sport but cricket,football and golf are provided in nearby villages. Similarly,a choral society,youth club, guides,brownies and cubs meet closeby.
